name: Techno Dad: Hot Tub Party
description:
The night is brisk, the old techno music is thumping, the dads are here. There's just one problem: there's only one hot tub and every dad wants in! Drag and drop dads into the hot tub to increase their happiness but don't leave one out for too long or they'll freeze to death and make the party lame.

Techno Dad: Hot Tub Party was made for Train Jam 2016 on the California Zephyr from Chicago to San Francisco by:

Thomas Engesser tmaxbosco@gmail.com

Amanda Hudgins @barelyconcealed

Andrada Tudor @dradamakesgames

Jeremiah Watts @jdubs64

Jeff Wright @jeffovertime
